Recent Works

Check out some of my projects...

Burger Project

Project Github

This is a tutorial project. I have used React Js, Redux and Firebase for database management and deployment. I have learnt React in whole with this project.

Chat App

Project Github

This is a messaging app. I have been learning several React libraries and hosting sites. As such, I used React Js, Socket.IO library, Express Js., MongoDb add-on for database management and Heroku for deployment.

Event Finder

Project Github

This is my summer project 2019, an event finder website in Helsinki. I used the database from MyHelsinki Open API for this project. It is also built using React Js and Express Js.

Movie Finder

Project Github

This is another web application, in which I used the database from MovieDb Open API. It is built in React Js.

Task Manager

Project Github

This is a Maven Java Project. I have used Spring Boot framework along with spring security, hibernate, and MYSQL for database management.
